title: ViewFrom
description: A suggested initial camera position offset when tracking this object, specified as a Cartesian position. Typically defined in the East (x), North (y), Up (z) reference frame relative to the object's position, but may use another frame depending on the object's velocity.

cartesian.description: The offset specified as a three-dimensional Cartesian value `[X, Y, Z]`.

reference.description: The offset specified as a reference to another property.

delete.description: Whether the client should delete existing samples or interval data for this property. Data will be deleted for the containing interval, or if there is no containing interval, then all data. If true, all other properties in this property will be ignored.
